name: Avoid Subroutines with more than X lines of code  (RPG300)
description: This rule searches for all the subroutines having more than X lines of code.
output:
This report lists RPG300 Subroutines with more than X lines of code.
It provides the following information:
RPG300 Subroutines full name, no. of lines in the Subroutine
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there the Soubroutines are not too big.
remediation: Review the source code in order to have Soubroutines with less than X lines of code.
alternativeName: Avoid Subroutines with more than X lines of code  (RPG300)

qualityStandards.name: Source Element Excessive Size
qualityStandards.description:
Objective
Avoid over-sizing of software elements

Consequence
Software that does not follow the principles of modularity causes excessive propagation of modification impacts

Measure Element
Number of instances where a file has too many lines of code based on a threshold value. The default threshold value for number of lines of code is 1000
